title: ReturnsSetup
description: This schema is used to set up locations where you will accpet returns

free_returns.description:
Communicate if you offer free returns to your customers so Jet can determine how return shipping will be charged.  'true' - We will charge your carrier account for shipping; you must provide Carrier and AccountNumber.  'false'  Jet.com will pay the return shipping and provide return shipping to the customer at our expense.

    		#Logic

    		If 'true' then 'carrier' and 'account_number' must be provided

carrier.description:
Name of the shipping carier used for returns. E.G. USPS, UPS, FedEx

    		#Logic

    		This field is required if 'free_returns' is 'true'

account_number.description:
Your account number with the carrier you are using for returns

    		#Logic

    		This field is required if 'free_returns' is 'true'
